solution_line_template: Five people borrowed {num_people_day1} people * {books_per_person_day1} books/person = <<{num_people_day1}*{books_per_person_day1}={books_borrowed_day1}>>{books_borrowed_day1} books on the first day.

After the second day, the total number of borrowed books increased to {books_borrowed_day1} books + {books_borrowed_day2} books = <<{books_borrowed_day1}+{books_borrowed_day2}={total_borrowed_books}>>{total_borrowed_books} books.

The total number of books on the shelf after the second day is {initial_novels} books - {total_borrowed_books} books = <<{initial_novels}-{total_borrowed_books}={remaining_books}>>{remaining_books} books
